QuestData.Title: The Zhevra
QuestData.Description: If you wish to serve my beloved horde, you'll have to prove your strength to me, pup. You can cut your teeth by hunting zhevra. They may not be the strongest of beasts in the Barrens, but stay clear of their kick or you'll regret it.$B$BHunt the zhevra to the north and south, and collect their hooves. Bring them to me and perhaps we'll next send you against something tougher.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Zhevra Runners to collect 4 Zhevra Hooves.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many zhevra have you slain?
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad, $n. Those zhevra hold a lot of strength in their legs. I've seen them knock even a tauren on its haunches!$B$BIt looks like you have some strength in you too.
